original_title: Sri Lanka declares electricity, petroleum, and health services as essential
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka has decided to declare multiple services as essential services.
An extraordinary gazette was issued on Wednesday (17) as per the powers vested in the President.
